author: adityapatwardhan
body:
- Delete temporary zip file.
- Remove CodeCov uploading through cygwin.
- Add code to use Invoke-WebRequest to upload to Codecov
- Wait for 1 build to start analysis.
- Do not wait for CI.
- Disable comments in PR.
